parameters.name: policy_family_id
parameters.description: (string) The family ID about which to retrieve information.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number for the family to fetch. Defaults to the latest version.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

get.description: Retrieve the information for an policy family based on its identifier and version
